name: Scary EIsa Granny
description:
Scary EIsa is a fun game and absolutely free for all ages, adults and children of both male and female behavior.

For you fans of Scary EIsa, this game is special for you.
In this game, you can play with many HD image of Scary EIsa.

Scary EIsa is a very challenging game and gained a lot of experience.


Scary EIsaset out on an adventure to save the world! ghost are attacking the city.
Jump on the roofs of the night city and catch the enemies,
collect coins ! To complete the game you need to collect as many gold coins!


HOW TO PLAY

• Press the button on the screen to jump over obstacles
• Collect Wings coins
• Fight your ghosts
• Run to the end to complete the level
